messages.subject: Welcome to new members
messages.msgSnippet: There s been an increase in membership lately, just want to welcome all of our new members. If you re new to the idea of unschooling, please feel free to
messages.messageBody:
There's been an increase in membership lately, just want to welcome
all of our new members. If you're new to the idea of unschooling,
please feel free to browse through our "links" section where you'll
find websites, blogs and reading all about unschooling.

Whether you're new to unschooling or a veteran, welcome to Unschooling
Basics!

I have a feeling the list is going to be somewhat lower volume as many
prepare to head for Albuquerque in September. For anyone that hasn't
heard about the Live and Learn conference, there's still time to sign
up. liveandlearnconference.org has all the details.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
